Following an unexpected lead, you find out about Maria. A random stop, drew Maria to ICE's attention, and in a panic-filled statement, she begged for mercy, not to be deported, and her fear of Lombardi.

The interviewing officers filled you in on her story, and the intriguing details she'd let slip. Unfortunately, she wasn't she sharpest knife in the drawer. Officer Castille nudged Officer Carter in the stomach, 'Though maybe a deep spoon'.

It filled you with dread about how curvy Maria was, and how curvy you'd have to be as her surrogate. With the real Maria being entered into Witness Protection, her photo wasn't available. You'd have to discover your new face and body on waking.

From the hints and jokes of the officers, and the busty wife he'd chosen. You knew you'd have sore shoulders for the entire assignment. You also suspect that Anna knows about you, and hates you. A bimbo like the original Maria wouldn't be subtle about leaving traces behind, and Lombardi wouldn't be bothered about rubbing his indiscretion in her face.

He runs brothels after all. You tell yourself. A fact you just accepted when investigating his network of businesses. But given your role undercover takes on a whole new menacing meaning.

- - - - -

You're escorted to Maria's apartment as soon as possible. With the summary notes, of everything she'd said to escape prosecution, and her life as a Mafia moll.

Reading it again and again, until you have it memorised, you throw the folder on the fire, and watch it burn up. Hissing as you suck your breath between clenched teeth, you catch your reflection in the brass hood of the fire place. Your familiar face appearing for the last time. You look to the nanite solution in your open palm.

Retreating to the bedroom, you stab yourself with the jagged end of the vial. The solution penetrates your skin, moving with an unnatural grace, it's nanites directing it with a basic intelligence. The spot of blood is absorbed and disappears, even the scratch on your skin is gone in a few seconds. A smoother patch of soft skin visible on your arm, spreading wider. In moments, it's a band around your arm. One frontier advancing towards your hand, the other racing towards your shoulder and the rest of your body.

Your heart gives a flutter, and you sit on the bed. As the room starts to spin, you allow yourself to collapse backwards. You feel pinned there, muscles refusing to raise you up, or give you any strength. Your whole body feels like jelly, shifting beneath your skin. Even that skin is transforming too.

The crack from your hips is heard more than felt, and you imagine your ass gaining extra width, and heft. Breathing becomes more of an effort. Not difficult, but your chest is certainly heavier, too. You try not to focus on those... those superficialities.

As your eyelids flutter shut, you feel the changes continue even as you fall into a dreamless sleep.

- - - - -

Waking with a start, you're flooded with a new range of emotions and sensations. Your instincts kick in, and you react, snapping up into sitting on the edge of the bed. Then quickly rising to stand.

The sudden movement a humiliating reminder of your new curvy body, and your assignment. Curiosity drives you to the wardrobe, and the full-length mirror there.

Suspecting what you'll see there, you're still surprised as you take in your reflection.

Maria is hot as hell, and even bustier than you imagined. Groaning, you realise that's probably a present from Lombardi too.

11531.content:
“Special Agent Kevin Sharp, it is a pleasure to meet you,” says your boss, Johnathan Alexander.
“Special Agent, sir?” you reply.
“Get used to it, or better yet, don’t. Shut the door behind you please, since everything I am about to say is highly classified.”

You slowly shut the door, until you hear a ‘click’.

“Kevin, why did you become an FBI agent?”
“Because I want to serve and protect my country sir.”
“Yes, we’ve all know the spiel, but I want to hear you say the real reason.”
You know what he wants to hear, and even though it brings up painful memories, you admit to the truth. “Because of my family’s murder, sir.”
“Drop the sir, this is all off the record. Your family was slaughtered, and you were sent to live with your grandmother, who died while you were attending university. You have no siblings or cousins or aunts or uncles, correct?”
“None that I am aware of sir.”

“You had the highest grades of any of your class members, and at your current age of 27, you are heavily being considered for a promotion to head of your department.”
“Thank you.”

“But it seems that even though you are young handsome, and successful, you are currently single, correct?”
“Correct sir.”
“Why?”
“Because I dedicate myself completely to my work sir.”
“There’s that standard answer again. The real reason for your solitude is that you’re afraid to be hurt again!”
“What?”
“Your parents died when you were eight years old, your grandmother died when you were twenty-one years old. Everyone you ever really loved is dead.”

“I don’t see what this has to do with anything John,” you say, using a short form of his first name to hint at some disrespect for his line of reasoning here.

“It means that mentally and socially, you are the perfect candidate to go undercover, and I want to add you to a new department that was just put together last month. This department is top secret, only 20 people outside of the President even know of its existence, and we want you to be the top agent there.”

“We?”
“Kevin, come with me to my car, and I’ll drive you there myself, we are doing advancements in the scientific field that are decades above what anyone thinks our capabilities are. If you accept this offer, there is no going back.”

“I understand John.”

“Then what is your answer?”

115311.content:
“Yes, I’ll do it!” you say. Your mind flashes to the James Bond movies you watched growing up, how you always imagined secret agents would act, and while you know that you won’t be saving the world everyday like he was, being the top agent of a new organization is how legends are made. This is an idea too good to pass up.

As you exit the office, and get into Johnathan’s car, he passes you a blindfold.
“This for your protection as much as mine.” he tells you, and you wrap it over your eyes without question.

You spend the next hour driving out of the city past some farms, and then you feel a thud as the car clearly drives off of the road for another half-hour. Eventually, you feel the wheels are on smooth ground again, and know that the journey is nearly complete.

Your boss takes the blindfold off. “Get out of the car,” he orders.

You walk from an underground parking spot to an elevator, which takes you down deep below the ground. Your boss wasn’t kidding when he told you this place was top secret. This place is secure.

Eventually, you go through a few cement tunnels until you reach a room that looks larger and more important than the rest.

“Remember Kevin, if you mention a word of what you see to anyone without authorization, you will end up dead!” he warns.
“Understood.” you say.

As the door opens, you see a circular room with computers placed on every wall.

“Dr. Heller!” your boss yells.
“Mr. Alexander,” a middle-aged man responds.
“This is Kevin Sharp, he’ll be are lead field agent.”
“Wonderful! Wonderful! Yes, I can see it in his eyes, the determination. The facial structure. Quite nice. Very good!” he says as he shakes your hand.

John turns to you, ignoring the scientist before you.
“Dr. Heller is probably the brightest mind on the planet, at least when it comes to bio-architecture.”
“Bio-architecture?”
“Think of it as the next step to plastic surgery. I can instantly alter your size, shape, sex, skin colour, ethnicity, age, and pretty much anything else that you can imagine. And the best part is that it is all 100% reversible.”

We aren't in a rush right now"

Bruce was the first one to pick up his envelope. Bruce had just graduated from high school this past spring and was getting ready for college. He was around 6 feet tall and weighed around 170 pounds. He had dark brown hair that he kept short, as well as blue eyes. In fact, he looked like a slightly younger version of his dad and older brother.

Jack on the other hand was 22 years old and had just graduated from college. He stood around 6 foot 2 inches tall and weighed around 195 pounds. He had brown hair like his dad and brother, though he kept his longer than they did, and blue eyes. A few months ago he couldn't wait to see what his future held for him, now he was more worried about the future than he ever had been in his life.

Lastly we have Trevor. He is 56 years old, around 6 feet tall and 200 pounds. He had blue eyes like both his sons, and brown hair that he kept very short to hide the spots of grey and balding. He lost his wife, Carol, just a few years after Bruce was born to cancer. While he occasionally dated a few times sense then, he never got serious enough to ever introduce any of the women to his sons let alone think about re-marring.

"If there's anything the three of you need, I'll just be right outside" the agent said.

"Thank you" replied Trevor.

With that the agent stepped out of the room and closed the door. Sitting at one of the chairs, Bruce opened the envelope with his name on it and began to browse through it. "This can't be right" he said with a confused look on his face.

"What do you mean?" His brother asked as he sat next to him.

"It says my new name is going to be a girl named Amanda who is 19 years old, 5 foot 5, weights about 100 pounds, and has blond hair and blue eyes"

"I think they screwed up your file bro" Jack said as he opened his envelope. After looking it over he looked up and said "I think they screwed up everyone's file. Says here I'm going to be some girl named Hillary, and that I'm 19, 5 foot 5, about 110 pounds, and have brown hair and brown eyes"

Opening the door, Trevor poked his head in the hall and said "um, excuse me but I think we have the wrong files here. My sons both opened theirs and it says they're both going to be 19 year old girls"

"That's right sir"

"How is that right. How is that even possible?"

"You see, we recently came across a device called the Corporeal Morpher. It's a machine that can alter any physical trait of a person from hight and weight to age and gender. We now use this to more effectively hide people in the witness protection program"

"And the best way to do that is to turn my sons into daughters?"

"And you their mother sir. The members of the mob will never look at 3 women and assume that they are their targets, and even if they did they wouldn't know where to start because there is very little connection to your old lives, if any at all"

"Ok, that makes sense. I guess." With that, Trevor closed the door and turned to his sons. "These are the right files boys"

Baffled, Jack and Bruce continued to look through their files. Apparently they were both going to be non identical twin sisters who were going to be attending college together. Jacks was now going to be Hillary Ann Ferguson, the older of the twins by a few minutes. She was going to be going to school to earn a earth sciences major, but more importantly in his eyes he was there on a full ride athletic scholarship. Even if it was to play softball, at least Jack would be able to play sports again like in high school when he was a 4 year varsity starter before injuring his knee his freshman year of college and ultimately having to call it quits because it wasn't healing right and hurt whenever he tried running to fast. As for the major, it was similar enough to what he had graduated with that he'd be able to understand what the professors were talking about.

Bruce on the other hand was going to become Amanda Rose Ferguson, the younger of the twin sisters. She was attending college with an undecided major, which Bruce liked because he hadn't decided what he wanted to do either. Like Hillary, Amanda would be attending school for free, but that was due in part to the fact that she had a number of academic scholarships giving her money every year.

Trevor was the last to look at his file. But once he opened it and scanned through it, he learned that his name will now be Gretchen Ruth Ferguson. 49 years old, 5 feet 3 inches, 90 pounds, with brown hair that has some signs of grey and blue eyes. She works as a personal trainer at a gym, which Trevor would be able to do sense he spent several of his earlier years in the army and has made serious effort to keep the physical standards.

After about an hour of each of them looking over their documents and reading through their life stories the FBI had made up, they decided that they were ready for the next step in the process. Opening the door again, Trevor poked his head out and let the doctor know that they were done.

"Alright, if the 3 of you could follow me we will get the changes started right away." He lead the 3 of them down the hall to another room that had several chairs outside the door. "Alright, if you could all wait here while we get everything ready. Who wants to go first?"

The 3 of them looked at each other briefly, before Bruce said "I'll go first I guess"

"Ok, I'll take your file and get everything ready"

135.content:
"Come with us."

A simple set of three words had never carried more weight or more uncertainty before in his life but Harold Maxwell knew better than questioning them or the person who spoke them. Life, for him anyway, had taken a dramatic turn when his wife and daughter came home from a shopping trip trembling, shaking, and spouting near gibberish for hours on end. Nothing made sense, everything seemed nonsensical, and the more he tried to calm them down and have them explain it to him, the more it seemed like a bad nightmare, a terrible dream, and one that he so hoped someone would wake him from.

Hell, right now he would've preferred someone whacking him with a 2x4, just to make some sense of the way his world was spinning.

The trial had been long, had been grueling, and had taken a toll out of everyone in the family. Sandra, his wife, had testified alongside his daughter, Hannah, and endured hours of grueling testimony and cross-examination. All the meanwhile, he had sat in the front to try and show his support. His sons, David and Marshall, had attempted to provide the familial support that they could but with both of them in college, they could only make phone calls, facetime and skype when possible. Three long months passed since the start of the trial and with the convictions...well, they thought it was all over.

Naively, he thought internally, until the first bodies started showing up.

The van-ride had been in silence, windows darkened to less than street-legal allowances (couldn't take the transportation administrator out of him, he mused with a sad chuckle to a zippered-shut daughter). There was a knock, three agents, and they were suddenly wisked out of their home without anything other than the clothes on their backs. No cellphones, no wallets or purses, everything was left right where they had set it down earlier in the evening. Harold knew they weren't coming back for them, simple as that.

By the time they arrived, hours at passed, and the dark night sky was calm, eerily so. Harold looked over at Sandra and Hannah as the two climbed down from the van and followed him into the building, lead by the lead FBI agent who merely looked at them with a look of sympathetic pity but had not said anything more than the terse "follow me". A few doors, a few hallways, then into a holding room before they finally saw a few chairs. "Have a seat."

Harold looked on as the door to the room opened and two familiar faces appeared: Yvonne Lee, the chief deputy US Attorney who had prosecuted the case and the FBI assigned to handling their case, Special Agent Tassert. Both women looked tired, exhausted, but somehow pleasantly happy to see them in their state. "We'll make this quick. You three will need to disappear."

Sandra cradled her daughter's head next to her chest. "What do you mean?"

"Five witnesses, all dead. We found Mr. Yorkshire...or what's left of him...about an hour ago. You two make the last of the unprotected witnesses. That, obviously, must be changed." Tassert took out a dossier folder and handed one to each of them. "We don't have much time to explain now though I promise you, once the procedure is all over, we will have time to explain everything to you. Take a moment, look at them, and then we'll be back in."

With a few moments, Harold looked at the folder in his hands and then looked at Sandra and Hannah, each of them with an uncertain look on their faces but with a simple nod, they looked in. For a moment. Then another. Silence fell over the three as each read the dossier inside and what information about what the FBI was intending to do with them.

"This...this is..." Sandra placed her file onto the table and Harold peered at it. "Is this for real?"

"Yes, Mrs. Maxwell," came the response as Agent Tassert returned. "There's no way that we can be sure that we got everyone connected to the guys you helped put away. A simple name change won't do, that's how they killed three of the others. It's hard but the moment you got into the van, our team started the erasure process. In effect, the Maxwell family died tonight. You have no lives to return to." Sandra raised a shaking hand to cover her mouth and Harold put a reassuring hand on her shoulder and another on Hannah's. "It will seem hard...but I assure you, this is the only way to guarantee your safety and security."

Lee nodded. "The US Attorney's office has worked out new identities and covers for your new lives and we will work with the FBI to make sure things go as smoothly as possible." She looked at the three with sympathetic eyes. "All new identities, new home, new job, new community...everything will be a fresh start for your family."

Harold took a moment and looked at them. "What about our sons?" A brief moment of panic crossed Sandra's face as she realized, until that point, the conversation had only mentioned the three of them presently in the room. While away at college, the two boys doted on their younger sister and Hannah often could be found lounging or hanging around one of them during the breaks. To say the three were close would be an understatement. To say they would be devastated if something happened to them would be an even greater one.

"Both of them are fine, Mr. Maxwell. That's all I can say about it for now. They are also taken into our protection and you will find out about them in due course." A few moments of relaxed breathing and a reassuring hug to both Sandra and Hannah later, he looked back at the folder in front of him.

"I-Is this going to happen?"

Tassert nodded. "The process is simple: Each of you will be taken into the facility, stripped down, and put under. Once the process is complete, you should awake in a few hours and you will then be reunited. I can't go into the details yet on what the process is but we have perfected it so there should be no complications or problems." She looked at them for a moment.

Choice 1: They remain a family but switched (Sandra goes first)

Choice 2: All three are sisters (Harold goes first)

Choice 3: All three are good friends (Hannah goes first)

1351.content:
Tassert led Sandra down a corridor after a last minute hug with her daughter and a lingering kiss with Harold. The agent seemed much more worn down than when she had first met her but given the circumstances of their visit and what they were presently doing, she could all but guess what was going on inside her head.

They walked quietly until they reached a set of double doors and, with one final breath, she turned and gave her a warm hug. "Good luck, Mrs. Maxwell." She returned the hug with as much warmth as she hoped she could convey under the circumstances and the smile on her face told her that it had been received. She pressed the pad next to the door and the two doors slid open with just the faintest hiss. Sandra took a few moments to collect her thoughts, looked down at herself one last time, and then stepped through the doors.

"Welcome, Mrs. Maxwell, we don't have a lot of time," came a sing-song voice that had just the right amount of priss that irritated her and when she turned, she noticed that a young man stood at the control panel of an interesting device. He tapped in a few commands, a few numbers, and then motioned for her to step forward onto a blue circular platform. "This will only be a second."

Hands from orderlies quickly reached out and stripped her of her blouse, skirt, belt, socks, shoes and then a pair of metal scissors came out and snipped off her panties and bra, leaving her there in all her nude glory. She wasn't in the best of shape but there was a small bit of pride that swelled up in her as she saw the man taking a bit longer than really necessary to glance at her before turning away with a small blush on his cheeks. "Err...yes...about your process, do you have any last minute questions?"

Sandra looked on as a small slab of metal rose from behind her and then somehow became soft and pliable enough to form a contour around her body frame down to the arches in her feet. "Um..what?"

He looked up from his position, his face still slightly flushed. "Any questions?"

She shook her head clear from the distractions around her and paused. "Yes...just one, really. Am I really going to be made into the person in my file?"

The man tapped a few buttons and a small screen popped up in front of her, mirroring what he was seeing. "You are Sandra Elizabeth Maxwell, 44, female, caucasian, 154 pounds, standing at a height of 5 feet 7 inches." He clicked a few more buttons and the screen shifted to a small readout. "Your new life will be dramatically different." He pressed another button and a small syringe sprung from a small arm that moved and then was deftly injected into her arm. "Any questions on your new life before you go under?"

The medicine was quick in reaction and Sandra could feel her eyes growing extremely heavy. "...can you tell me anything?"

The tech nodded and pressed another sequence of buttons with the screen scrolling through a bunch of text before he settled on one that, given the blurred lights and semi-drunken stupor Sandra felt creeping over her, she could not quite read. "When you awake, you'll be Thomas Gerald Mitchell, 19, caucasian male, 210 pounds, standing at a height of 6 feet 4 inches. Quite the looker, I might add..."
1351.title: Sandra goes first

135132.content:
Sandra slowly opened her eyes, a momentary blinding flash of white caused her to flinch slightly, before they adjusted and she could make out the outline of the fluorescent light fixture above. Another few moments passed before she could feel a presence in the room next to the bedside and she slowly turned her head over.

“Well…at least we know it works.”

Standing next to her bedside was a young man, a boy in his teenage years, that looked at once familiar and yet completely foreign to her. He stood at a decent height, maybe around 5 foot 7, and had dusty blonde hair. His features were a mixture of various ethnicities, though she could very well have just gone with the WASP description. The feature she immediately noticed, though, was his eyes. His eyes were a crystal green hue.

Hannah had those very eyes.

“H-Hannah?” she whispered and immediately felt her throat as the voice, though raspy, was definitely much lower and more pronounced. The adams apple underneath her hand, too, was something equally as pronounced.

“One and the same…sort of.” The boy smiled and nodded his head. “It’s Michael, though…that’s what they tell me, anyway.” He looked at her for a few moments. “Would you like to see how you turned out?”

143.content:
The name’s Steven. At least, that was it for the first 37 years of my life. Before I met Dr. Heller and he zapped me with his bizarre device (the Corporeal Morpher). Now? You can call me "Stephanie", I suppose. The bastard somehow switched my brain into the body of a teenage girl he abducted for his crazy experiments! I don’t know anything about who she was prior to any of this. He tricked me into visiting his mad laboratory, and when I awoke, I was in her body, and her brain is trapped in my body, I suppose. I haven’t seen my original body since any of this happened.

         Apparently, the lab was abandoned (it was raided by the FBI agents but Steve is unaware of this) during my body changeover process, though no one found me while I was still recovering in a secret room. Waking up, I found no trace of my original body, nor the mad doctor and his infernal machine.

         Just me, 37-year-old Steve, suddenly in the body of an unknown, super-cute teen girl! She was wearing a hair beret, a cute plaid short-sleeve half-top with buttons and a collar over a bra, and hip-hugger shorts over panties. Now, it’s me, formerly 37 year old Steve looking adorable and sweet in this teen girl’s body, wearing these clothes! It's all too weird for me to comprehend!

         I find a pair of sandals she was wearing and I leave the laboratory via a secret tunnel leading outside, where I find myself lost in an area of thick forests. I need to find someone who will help me regain my old body! I can’t stay trapped like this!



As I make my way back to civilization, I run into -

1431.content:
You look up to the intimdating woman. Still overwhelmed by the sheer vulnerability you feel in this too lush 18 year old body.

Even fully clothed, and dressed as plainly as you can manage, you still end up looking far too sexy for your own comfort.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/2d/b1/dc/...

Your attempt at tomboy ending up with you looking more like Lara Croft than you'd like.

The woman towers over you. Her hands on your shoulders, steadying you. Your entire body like jello seems to still be shaking and rippling from the impact.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c4/32/3d/...

"Careful there, cutie pie." The voice doesn't fit the body. It sounds far too friendly, for the way she's dressed. The long black coat reminds you of dangerous figures lurking in dark alleyways.

It doesn't help that she is stronger than you. Her arms driving you back, keeping a firm grip on your shoulders. She takes you in from the crown of wild hair, down to the Dr. Martens boots.

"Are you okay?" she asks.

"Uh...huh, ma'am..." Even now, she intimidating. So calm, and self-possessed. You can picture her like a pimp....No! A madame running a brothel. You try to dislodge that idea, it's just too real. Your imagination completing the story, your body marking you out as vulnerable, and able to be manipulated and ... taken.

"Can... I go now?" you ask. Uncertain, even why you need to ask her permission.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/2b/28/df/...

"Of course, Steve... or is it Stephanie now."

The voice is different, but the tone and the wording horrify, and freeze you to the spot. The confidence, the arrogance turn your stomach to water, and your muscles to wet noodles.

She nods, as the realization is painted on your face, "Doc... Doctor Heller..." She just beams, with perfect white teeth hidden behind lush, full lips.

You eventually went back to you're new room and tidied it up there and then.

You then received a message...

Steve this is the FBI

Your mission is a long term mission that will last 10 years or maybe more.

There is a young man in your class at school who is called Paolo Robert Alfonsi, he's your target, you are going to be his girlfriend and eventually his wife.

He's a geek and is a little scared of girls although he does like them... His father is a man on the rise is the crime world and has connections going back to Italy itself, with in five or six years he'll be a crime boss and the head of the family.

Paolo father is always on his case about his getting a girlfriend and this is your opportunity.

P.S do what you have to do, no matter what.

You received one more message saying "your parents are your adoptive parents, they took you when both your really parents died in a car accident when you were about four mothers old.

Your name is Sophia Ellie Marotta not Frazier your father was American Italian and your mother was full Italian from Florence although her family are in the Italian mafia the marriage was an arranged marriage between the two families.

You have now got a background of this girl you are and tomorrow you'll get on with your mission.

You think how are you going to do this, you looked at the calendar and realised a prom is coming up so you'll ask Paolo Robert Alfonsi out to the prom and hopefully he'll accept...

14321111.content:
Next day you woke up and got a shower, washed your hair and shaved then you went into your room and got dressed and put on a bra with out thinking about almost like it was second nature to you.

You thought "this is strange" you went into the kitchen and saw your adoptive mother and she spoke Italian to you and you automatically replied back in Italian perfectly.

You just carry on as if nothing is wrong till your mother said in Italian "are you OK darling" you quickly say "I was just thinking of my parents, I wish I knew them" you realised you might of slipped up here.

But your mother said "you would of loved them darling, me and your mother came here from Italy and when they died I took you on as my own daughter, I love you Sophia" you stood up and said "I love you to mama"

Right you should be going to school as you need to keep up with your grades and remember you have Capoeira practice and I'll pick you up once I has finished and soccer tomorrow practice tomorrow evening.

You kissed your mom good bye then left for school dressed in a school uniform skirt, blouse, school jacket, tights and plain black shoes.

The symbol on the uniform says "Saint Michael's Catholic School" you eventually got to school and got on with your classes as you watched Paolo Robert Alfonsi from a distance.

At lunch you noticed he was sitting by himself so you had the perfect opportunity and sat down at has table.

You ate your lunch and started talking to him in Italian... He looked up at you and brightened up very quickly and started talking back although he is very nervous... You just said "Paolo do you want to go to the prom with me" he looked at you and said "why me?" well I wasn't planning on going as I hate wearing dresses and make up but I thought it would help your reputation around school if you do go and you do seem nice...

He smiled and said "thank you Sophia and yes I would love to go to the prom with you"

The rest of the day you both got to know each other and Paolo was in fact a really nice guy and over the day you both become friends or start a friendship... You swapped phone numbers and added each other to social media.

The school day came to an end and you both went your separate ways Paolo went home and you went to the Capoeira practice.

You got changed and started to warm up and then the practice started and you are shocked what this body can do and how intense Capoeira is it's a mix of dance, gymnastics and martial arts.

You've apparently been doing it for 11 years you started it when you were 5 years old...

info.brief_description: You go undercover, in a new body
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

Dr Heller is a brilliant but dangerous man. You might even call him a mad scientist, although he isn't crazy. At least that's what psychs say.

He developed a machine which can completely alter the physical characteristics of a person, height, weight, facial structure, even age and gender. .He was arrested while testing it on unwilling people.

Dr Heller's device, the Corporeal Morpher, is now in the hands of the FBI. It is kept secret and used to disguise agents for important undercover missions.
